en.name: Sacrificial Jade
en.passiveDescription: When not on the field for more than 5s, Max HP will be increased by {{32//40//48//56//64%}} and Elemental Mastery will be increased by {{40//50//60//70//80}}. These effects will be canceled after the wielder has been on the field for 10s.

zh.name: 遗祀玉珑
zh.passiveDescription: 处于队伍后台超过5秒后，生命值上限提升{{32//40//48//56//64%}}，元素精通提升{{40//50//60//70//80}}点。装备者登场并留在场上10秒后，该效果将失效。
